title: 90/328/EEC: Commission Decision of 22 May 1990 approving the programme of measures submitted by the Italian Government for 1990 on the restructuring of the system for agricultural surveys in Italy (Only the Italian text is authentic)
header:
COMMISSION  DECISION
of 22 May 1990
approving the programme of measures submitted by the Italian Government for 1990 on the restructuring of the system for agricultural surveys in Italy
(Only the Italian text is authentic)
(90/328/EEC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: The programme of measures on the restructuring of the system for agricultural surveys in Italy submitted by the Italian Government for 1990 is approved.
This Decision is addressed to the Italian Republic.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 22 May 1990.
For the Commission
Henning CHRISTOPHERSEN
Vice-President

(2) OJ No L 359, 8. 12. 1989, p. 8.
